Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton scored 33 points and handed out 15 assists
Pascal Siakam had 18 points and 11 rebounds
Kel’el Ware led the Heat with 25 points
Jimmy Butler scored nine points, and didn’t play in the fourth quarter for a second consecutive night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Miami is now 736-395 in the building, including 86-36 in playoff games
Others: The game was the 25th anniversary of Miami's first game at what is now called Kaseya Center
Both teams are at home Saturday night, with the Pacers hosting Phoenix and the Heat hosting Utah
